parameters.name: elementRef
parameters.description: A ref pointing to an HTMLVideoElement, HTMLImageElement, HTMLCanvasElement or null. Default is undefined.

parameters.name: formats
parameters.description: An array of barcode formats to detect (e.g., ['qr_code', 'ean_13']). Defaults to a comprehensive list of common formats.

parameters.name: onDetect
parameters.description: Optional callback to be called when a barcode is detected.

returnValues.name: current
returnValues.description: An object containing the format, rawValue, and boundingBox of the detected barcode, or null if none found.

returnValues.name: start
returnValues.description: A function to start the scanning process.

returnValues.name: stop
returnValues.description: A function to stop the scanning process.

returnValues.name: supported
returnValues.description: Indicates if the BarcodeDetector API is available in the user's browser environment.
